"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>7684710b-db78-4403-ae14-32a9e452782e#1#6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A kiválasztó szervek</string>
            <string language="en">The secretory organs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die ausscheidenden Organe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les organes sécréteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os órgãos secretory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli organi secretivi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα εκκριτικά όργανα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los órganos secretores</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A belső környezet fogalma, a kiválasztó szervek felépítése, működése és egészsége</string>
            <string language="en">Definition of the internal surround, build, functioning and health of the secretory organs</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">kiválasztás,  vese,  belső környezet,  kiválasztó szerv,  </string>
            <string language="en">secretion, kidney, internal surround, secretory organ</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Definition vom internen umgeben, bauen, Arbeiten 
und Gesundheit der ausscheidenden Organe auf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La définition de l'interne entourent, 
construisent, fonctionnement et santé des organes sécréteurs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A definição do interno cerca, constrói, 
funcionar e saúde dos órgãos secretory</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La definizione dell'interno circonda, costruisce, 
funzionare e salute degli organi secretivi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καθορισμός του εσωτερικού πλαισίου, χτίζει, 
λειτουργία και υγεία των εκκριτικών οργάνων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La definición del interno rodea, construye, 
funcionamiento y salud de los órganos secretores</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absonderung, die Niere, intern umgeben, ausscheidendes 
Organ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la sécrétion, rein, interne entourent, organe 
sécréteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o secretion, kidney, interno cerca, órgão secretory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la secrezione, rene, interno circonda, organo secretivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έκκριση, νεφρό, εσωτερικό πλαίσιο, εκκριτικό όργανο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la secreción, riñón, interno rodea, órgano secretor</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>

          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>

        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

fn:

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
